metadata.title: CVE-2021-47623 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:powerpc/fixmap: Fix VM debug warning on unmapUnmapping a fixmap entry is done by calling __set_fixmap()with FIXMAP_PAGE_CLEAR as flags.Today, powerpc __set_fixmap() calls map_kernel_page().map_kernel_page() is not happy when called a second timefor the same page.	WARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 1 at arch/powerpc/mm/pgtable.c:194set_pte_at+0xc/0x1e8	CPU: 0 PID: 1 Comm: swapper Not tainted5.16.0-rc3-s3k-dev-01993-g350ff07feb7d-dirty #682	NIP:  c0017cd4 LR: c00187f0 CTR: 00000010	REGS: e1011d50 TRAP: 0700   Not tainted(5.16.0-rc3-s3k-dev-01993-g350ff07feb7d-dirty)	MSR:  00029032 <EE,ME,IR,DR,RI>  CR: 42000208  XER: 00000000	GPR00: c0165fec e1011e10 c14c0000 c0ee2550 ff800000 c0f3d000 00000000c001686c	GPR08: 00001000 b00045a9 00000001 c0f58460 c0f50000 00000000 c0007e1000000000	GPR16: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 0000000000000000	GPR24: 00000000 00000000 c0ee2550 00000000 c0f57000 00000ff8 00000000ff800000	NIP [c0017cd4] set_pte_at+0xc/0x1e8	LR [c00187f0] map_kernel_page+0x9c/0x100	Call Trace:	[e1011e10] [c0736c68] vsnprintf+0x358/0x6c8 (unreliable)	[e1011e30] [c0165fec] __set_fixmap+0x30/0x44	[e1011e40] [c0c13bdc] early_iounmap+0x11c/0x170	[e1011e70] [c0c06cb0] ioremap_legacy_serial_console+0x88/0xc0	[e1011e90] [c0c03634] do_one_initcall+0x80/0x178	[e1011ef0] [c0c0385c] kernel_init_freeable+0xb4/0x250	[e1011f20] [c0007e34] kernel_init+0x24/0x140	[e1011f30] [c0016268] ret_from_kernel_thread+0x5c/0x64	Instruction dump:	7fe3fb78 48019689 80010014 7c630034 83e1000c 5463d97e 7c0803a6 38210010	4e800020 81250000 712a0001 41820008 <0fe00000> 9421ffe0 93e1001c 48000030Implement unmap_kernel_page() which clears an existing pte.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47623` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
